name: Neant
text: For why you don't understand, this hole seems more important than the others.

name: Neant
text: Perhaps it is the way it's positioned that makes you think so ?

name: Neant
text: Or should it be my sudden presence that confirms your instinct.

name: Neant
text: Whatever the case, the beast seems unwilling to leave its lair.

name: Neant
text: And so ends your adventure? Unable to face your fears because they've inherited your shyness?
